note.p: Dutch astronomer. Studied at Leiden University. Astronomer of the obsevatory at Leiden, 1853–6; professor of astronomy at Utrecht, 1856; chief of the geographical service in the East Indian Colonies, 1857–75; professor of astronomy and director of the observatory at Utrecht, 1875–98.
Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society 67 (1907): 241–2
